name: Twelve Horny Women
writer: Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (creator), Eric Falconer, Chris Romano, Craig Gerard (executive story editor), Matthew Zinman (executive story editor), Dan Gregor (executive story editor), Doug Mand (executive story editor)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: While Marshall faces the most important court case of his career against his new arch-nemesis, Brad Morris, the rest of the gang tries to figure out which one was the biggest bad-ass in their youth.
